alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elbert and Lincoln Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1001 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Genoa to 11 miles northeast of Kutch to 9 miles north of Rush, or along a line extending from 21 miles northwest of Flagler to 14 miles south of Limon to 35 miles east of Colorado Springs. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo, Arriba, Genoa, Boyero, Karval, Punkin Center, Kutch and Forder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
